column3: Price applies to a designated group membership
Price applies to sales outside the territory in which the supplier is located

column2: Reduced price applicable when the item is purchased as part of a set
column3: Use in cases where there is no combined set price, but a lower price is offered for each part if the whole set is purchased

In the Netherlands (or any other market where similar arrangements exist): a reduced fixed price available for a limited time on presentation of a voucher published in a specified medium, eg a newspaper. Should be accompanied by <PriceTypeCode> 13 and additional detail in <PriceTypeDescription>, and by validity dates in <PriceEffectiveFrom> and <PriceEffectiveUntil>.
